title: True Damage skins T-Shirt leaked.
body:
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/d3257bbe9cbf53423351932c941890a037673009d71f0127ee752087e0c56bcf.jpg

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/be26eafb492e4886dd247d99b769ff2e837261b960c49e2477baf98475b24291.jpg

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/10fc815630658f01ecf86d95161f1d594af77fc2f337737b7664bbac48fd9714.png

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/c9ee86574d7a34bf3a820104868a001f59461e98438f3b6246c163c164a349ae.jpg

Get your disappointment ready cause here they are

Looks like we be getting: **Yasuo,  Senna, Ekko, Qiyana and Akali.. **Hmm Rito why? Why Akali again? I get she's a new hot seller but she just had K/DA last year... is her rap moment that spectacular that you want to try to pull it off again? It's gonna get kinda old.

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/2fbc3a5f96231ecfdde68c6e76831a4d442f9173773a9fe5f1c08295fae99456.jpg
The mini figure are here as well

replies.body:
Why Akali, though?

The others I get cause they aren't in bands, but why Akali?
That's what I said :(  She already got K/DA and then she got PROJECT this year... did she really need another one, let alone another musical skin?

Was trying to think "maybe its someone else," but nope, that's Akali.
Idk about K/DA lore, but maybe this is like her pre-K/DA gig, like how Popstar Ahri came before K/DA.

Yeah, at first a few people thought it was Kayn, but no it's indeed Akali from the hair style and it's just sad.

I mean, for Ahri it's a bit understandable because Popstar was released in 2013 and then K/DA is an upgrade in 2018. So she moved on from being a solo artist to a girl group (though most people usually do the opposite XD)

Akali though.. I dunno.  It could come as something before K/DA maybe. It just feels weird.

Thing is that Akali doesn't appear to have her... Whatever the hell the thing is that is on her lower back that holds all her stuff. She has that in every skin in some capacity, right?

But, if it were Kayn, Rhaast would be there too, wouldn't he?

Hmm true, does appear to be missing something there.  Though it's not like Qiyana is holding her disc on the shirt either, or Senna with her Cannon, Ekko with his time thing.  So there are some of their basic elements (weapons) missing.

And yeah I'd say Rhaast would have appeared in some form if it were them.

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EtfZg87A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-17T22:01:24.105+0000)
>
> Why Akali, though?
> 
> The others I get cause they aren't in bands, but why Akali?

Gotta try and catch up to Miss Fortune's/Ezreal's skin amount somehow! Just splurge them out 2-3 a year until she catches up!
I mean, new skin line requires popular champions. Riot learned that the hard way with Papercraft, which performed poorly due to the champion choice.

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EtfZg87A,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2019-10-17T23:14:32.256+0000)
>
> I mean, new skin line requires popular champions. Riot learned that the hard way with Papercraft, which performed poorly due to the champion choice.

Tbf, papercraft wasnt so much champion choice so much as Nunubot is infinitely better than anything rito could ever release for nunu ever.

Yeah but both Anivia and Nunu are somewhat unpopular, definitely not MF/Ezreal levels of popular. I think a Rioter even admitted that they were a flop because Anivia and Nunu just aren't popular.

But they also learned their lesson with the BA skins too. Its getting to the point where the skins for popular champions are becoming basic and disappointing because they can't compare to what they already have. Like, how is True Damage Akali going to top K/DA?

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EtfZg87A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-17T22:01:24.105+0000)
>
> Why Akali, though?
> 
> The others I get cause they aren't in bands, but why Akali?

Riot doesn't have the balls to make a Yordle a vocalist or Reksai a DJ

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EtfZg87A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-17T22:01:24.105+0000)
>
> Why Akali, though?
> 
> The others I get cause they aren't in bands, but why Akali?

I would guess that so called "K-POP fans in Rito" got green light from CUBE Ent. to work with Soyeon (voice of Akali in song). So no wonder we will get new skin of Akali. They are sure that she will sell new song and skin line like last time (Yes, let's not forget that she was iconic in last song). I feel that this skin line might be flop. They are making more than falf of community angry. 

It is sad that they are going to do Yasuo and Akali skins ONCE MORE. I know Yasuo don't have music theme skin but do he need it now? They could wait and realise it next year for him. 

Akali - yeah not happy with it but 99% it is cuz they got Soyeon.

TBH I have wished for band like KARD in LoL. 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} We have got poor Star Guardian and now even worst line up (Akali and Yasuo) for music skins {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 


RITO NEEDS NEW PPL FOR SKINS

Ekko, Yasuo, Akali, Senna and....?

Honestly the inclusion of Yasuo and Akali makes this SO disapointing. ESPECIALLY throwing Akali in another band.... lemme guess she leaves KD/A or something.
Chick with the glasses and bun is Qiyana. She's getting a prestige edition, too.
so none of them actually deal true damage. just cash cow champions lmao

Akali just got a skin for Project. ASHDGSHGDSAHFGASHF. Rito whyyyyyy. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Edit: Also Yasuo, FML.
Are these skins or just for the shirt?
They're skins. Senna's leaked splash showed her True Damage skin.

They are indeed skins that will be coming on to the PBE on the 29th.

We saw the Senna splash a few months ago https://i.imgur.com/dl6wiB4.jpg[]

Senna: Sure
Qiyana: Yeah
Ekko: Alright
Yasuo: No
Akali: NO

I'm so sick of seeing these two in game let alone getting more skins.
That's why Ekko hasn't been nerfed...
Wow. A true damage team and you don't give a skin to velkoz, a champion who hasn't had a skin in over 1,300 days and you know, ACTUALLY DEALS TRUE DAMAGE.

How would Vel'Koz possible fit in this kind of skin line though? The answer is, he wouldn't, unless you shoe horned him in so hard it looked ridiculous.

Let's give ol Koz a skin that actually fits him.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EtfZg87A,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2019-10-18T03:57:56.529+0000)
>
> How would Vel'Koz possible fit in this kind of skin line though? The answer was he wouldn't unless you shoe horned him in so hard it looked ridiculous.
> 
> Let's give ol Koz a skin that actually fits him.

Sad as it is, this is true for a lot of champions since Riot likes to release skins in groups. It still doesn't change the fact we could've had an Infernal Vel, or Elderwood Vel with tree root tentacles (same goes for plenty of champs with few skins in general or few recent skins)
Akali is really not needed in there...We could have had vayne or sona or caitlyn

***No Taliyah?????***

I'm literally this close to start throwing rocks.
I am happy she didn't get a skin for something trash like this. Although at this rate she might get a 520 RP pity skin by 2021.
"throw another rock"

Not sure what music True Damage plays, but I feel like its not really a good fit for Taliyah anyway.

I could see her as a part of some sort of, say, orchestral, instrumental band of sorts. The music is harsh when it has to be, but is for the most part flowing, melodic, and soothing. I think Bard, Jhin, Janna, and Kindred would be good picks for it too.

Hm. I guess you're right. 

I think I've just been extra frustrated this year after seeing many good opportunities for Taliyah to be getting another skin and not seeing anything (I'm not counting her esports skin). Seeing yet another possibility being scraped away kinda hurt.

Sorry. I'm going to be keeping an eye out for any potential Taliyah skins until the end of the year... And then maybe next year... Hopefully they don't disappoint.

I mean, as someone who mains a lot of unpopular champions in various roles, Taliyah included, I understand the frustration.

At least one  of the players from SSG not only played Taliyah during worlds, but picked her for their Worlds skin. They could have picked any other champion they played, but they picked Taliyah, and I think we should all be grateful and thank them for that.
Yeah, I am pretty grateful for that! But it's still kinda sad that Riot only made that skin because someone requested it. Otherwise, Taliyah might still be stuck with only her launch skin.

It really does suck. 

Some of these champs are pretty cool when they come out then just fall off the face of the earth cause they don't get the love they should have.  Nerfs were some of the main things that have killed champs like Taliyah, Kalista, Azir (even though he was fortunate to gain skins before then). Other unpopular niche picked champions like Ivern, Ornn, ect just suffer in their own ways.  But as whole, these champs deserve more too. 

Even this year Yorick got an April Fools skin, and had gotten his Archlight only last year after waiting for what felt like a century. He's still unpopular and yet they proved they can still make more skins even when they are for an unpopular champion. So I dunno what holds them back on some of these.

Looks like Akali and Yasuo are joining the minimum 1 skin per year club, alongside Ahri, Ezreal, Lux, Miss Fortune, and Annie.

Meanwhile, Taliyah and Kindred cry in the corner alongside Xerath and Vel'koz who have come to terms with it.
Meanwhile Zilean still waits for his promised skin.
Oh look, another skinline solely for popular champions and a new champion bound to be popular. How... new...
Are new champions(Senna) not allowed to have release skins anymore?

Getting real sick of Riot's champ choices for skins. FFS Yasuo and Akali just got skins a few months ago. Hell AKALI IS NOW GETTING A THIRD NON-ESPORTS RELATED SKIN IN OVER A YEAR!!!! 

I'm fucking sick of seeing her at this point.
Why Yasuo, he just got an Arcade skin this year
Likely akali because the singers likely have a pick on who they want.
Okay, maybe I am the minority here, but I think it is kinda BS that they put Akali in **another** band skin line instead of another champion.... She already is in K/DA, why now in True Damage, too?

> [{quoted}](name=Chembaron Yamada,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EtfZg87A,comment-id=003f,timestamp=2019-10-19T21:04:30.990+0000)
>
> Okay, maybe I am the minority here, but I think it is kinda BS that they put Akali in **another** band skin line instead of another champion.... She already is in K/DA, why now in True Damage, too?

Most of us feel the same way. Gotta say though I never realized she was that popular when it comes to skin sales to warrant another band skin, especially since she got her Project skin not too long ago as well.
Well from what has been gathered, it is possible that True Damage is before her joining K/DA as she is supposed to be a well known rapper based on the K/DA lore.

Which is still kinda lame, tbh. They are basically just repeating the thing they did with Popstar Ahri, which was her as a solist, before she joined K/DA.

Now it is just Akali who was in another band before K/DA... Like, come on, they already did this thing. What's going to happen next, we get a new Punk Rock band and Kai'Sa gets a skin alongside "because she was a member of a Punk Rock band before"?
Yeah it is pretty much the same thing. At least in Ahris case there was a major gap of time between the two skins. This one there isn't {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

True damage, but none of the champions deal true damage.

{{champion:103}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:164}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:142}} 
ALL these champions deal some form of true damage, and there's several fan favorite skin sellers in there.

Tell me you wouldn't pay top dollar to see Cho'gath in bling rapping.
Or camille in gold plated legs with a fur coat?

But no, we gotta get our monthly Yasuo and Akali skins in there somehow eh Riot?

Yeah and look at all the Pentakills Sona gets. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Band names have nothing to do with what champions are chosen.

I'm just saying It would be far more fitting thematically for it to have members in it that do true damage. Quite a few underrepresented champions are in that category and Riot missed an oppertunity to cash out, yet again.

> [{quoted}](name=Spooky Skeleton,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EtfZg87A,comment-id=001d00010001,timestamp=2019-10-18T13:50:37.319+0000)
>
> I'm just saying It would be far more fitting thematically for it to have members in it that do true damage. Quite a few underrepresented champions are in that category and Riot missed an oppertunity to cash out, yet again.

How is it a missed opportunity when they know they'll make bank from Akali, Yasuo, and Qiyana.

I get that they sell skins, i really do. But not everyone is a fan of those champions. I like monstrous and undead themed champions and those get almost no love from Riot in terms of skins. I'm never seeing any representation for my favorite champions.

There's gotta be a middle ground where they shit out a Kai'sa/Yasuo skin every week but still give the older champions some love.
